title: Wow! This is a movie..
review: Requem for a dream..What a movie.. I've heard about it from friends and everyone for years but haven't seen the movie since some hours ago.. Wow! That's what I could say. THis is it.. This would be the film I made if I were a director.. This would be the film I would be in it if I were an artist.. Not satisfied yet.. Watch it. .You must watch it.. After this movie, you might want to take a look onto your life and might want to change many things you stuck with.. :)
